content:
Craft an item of type: wooden_axe

thought: To craft a wooden axe I need to place two sticks and three planks in a certain pattern on the crafting table. I will start by placing the oak plank from slot 39 into slot 1 of the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 27 to slot 2 with quantity 1
